title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: Narrative Instructional Design Aesthetics: Constructing Emotional Structures in Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design language education modules utilizing the three-act narrative structure (setup-development-conclusion).
Emotional elements such as rhythm, characters, and sequences can be systematically applied when developing educational content.
Evaluation criteria for educational scenarios can be developed and applied by adapting the dramatic structure of Greek tragedy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
